Question.Subject: My FormspringMe page won't display any questions beyond the front page; is there a way this can be changed?
Question.Content:
Someone just pointed out to me that for some reason my account seems to have a glitch where only the first page is displayed, and when the "More" button is selected nothing happens.
Does anyone know how I can fix this problem so all my questions are displayed?
Question.ChosenAnswer: I've noticed that all the sites have been doing that today...it must just be a glitch in the entire website. If it still doesn't work in a few days contact the owners of formspring err whatever..

Answer.Content: I've noticed that all the sites have been doing that today...it must just be a glitch in the entire website. If it still doesn't work in a few days contact the owners of formspring err whatever..
